name: fantland
story:
Fantasyland is a fantasy 2D side-scrolling platform game that puts players in the shoes of a blonde haired guy whoï¿½s girlfriend gets kidnaped at the start of the game by a cloaked bad guy.

As you traverse the stages, you have to navigate through an obstacle course. Each stage has a different theme like medieval, middle eastern, winter, underwater and dungeon. Enemies are either melee fighters or range fighters and each stage has an end boss.

You fight enemies with your shooting ability, jumping enemies on the head will also kill them. Power-ups for this ability can be found along the way, as well as additional health. You are aided by your loyal parrot that can also shoot at enemies. Keys for opening doors sometimes have to be retrieved. The game can be played solo or with a friend.
